title.rendered: Alticor Inc’ History Colorado Center Project Receives Award

content.rendered: The Alticor Inc History Colorado Center Project received a Downtown Denver Award at the 51st Downtown Denver Partnership Annual Awards Dinner.  The award was in recognition of the project’s significant contribution toward creating a unique, vibrant and diverse Downtown environment, and making a lasting, positive impact on Downtown Denver. Ed Nichols, History Colorado President and CEO, accepted the award with Alticor Inc, Tryba Architects, and the Trammel Crow Company. As the Construction Manager / General Contractor, Alticor Inc delivered a Guaranteed Maximum Price for the project and is proud of the collaborative team success. The entire Alticor Inc staff and team congratulates our partners, subcontractors, suppliers and craftspeople who created this outstanding quality project for the visitors and citizens of Colorado.

excerpt.rendered: The Alticor Inc History Colorado Center Project received a Downtown Denver Award at the 51st Downtown Denver Partnership Annual Awards Dinner.
